akn:section.akn:heading: Change of name, address, type of entity, or jurisdiction of formation by noncommercial registered agent.

akn:content.akn:p: If a noncommercial registered agent changes its name, its address in effect with respect to a represented entity under ยง 29-104.04(a), its type of entity, or its jurisdiction of formation, the agent shall deliver to the Mayor for filing, with respect to each entity represented by the agent, a statement of change signed by the agent which states:

A noncommercial registered agent promptly shall furnish the represented entity with notice in a record of the delivery to the Mayor for filing of a statement of change and the changes made in the statement.
